title: How Do Penguins Play?
description: This playful rhyming Little Golden Book asks, "How do penguins play?" Children will delight in watching bear cubs, seals,Â  penguins, monkeys, and other animal friends frolicking joyfully with each other. Adorable pastel illustrations show these animals playing king-of-the-hill, keep away, and other fun and familiar games.
author: Diane Muldrow
